data.name: Gwenom
data.description: Fueled by alien power, Gwen Stacy bonded with the Venom symbiote to become Gwenom, who uses deadly precision to lash out at her foes.

starItems.name: Gwenom
starItems.description: Fueled by alien power, Gwen Stacy bonded with the Venom symbiote to become Gwenom, who uses deadly precision to lash out at her foes.

1.description: Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target.
3.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to primary and adjacents

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to self and all <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color> allies

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to self and all <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color> allies.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to self and all <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color> allies.
6.nextUpgrade:
Clear Barrier on primary and adjacent targets
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

7.description:
Clear Barrier on primary and adjacent targets.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to self and all <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color> allies.

1.description:
Gain the opposite of <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, on the primary target.
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, spread <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, from self to all <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color> allies.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target

2.description:
Gain the opposite of <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, on the primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, spread <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, from self to all <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, spread <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>

3.description:
Gain the opposite of <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, on the primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, spread <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, from self to all <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color> allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Gain the opposite of <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, on the primary target

4.description:
Gain the opposite of <color=#86e619>3</color> random negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, on the primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, spread <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, from self to all <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to self and all <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color> allies

5.description:
Gain the opposite of <color=#86e619>3</color> random negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, on the primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to self and all <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, spread <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, from self to all <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color> allies.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Gain the opposite of all negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, on the primary target

6.description:
Gain the opposite of all negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, on the primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to self and all <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, spread <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, from self to all <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color> allies.
6.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, spread all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>

7.description:
Gain the opposite of all negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, on the primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to self and all <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, spread all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>, from self to all <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color> allies.

1.description:
Clear all Barrier from all targets.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to all enemies

2.description:
Clear all Barrier from all targets.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

3.description:
Clear all Barrier from all targets.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to enemy with highest Damage
This attack gains +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus per <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> ally

4.description:
Clear all Barrier from all targets.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the enemy with the highest Damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus per <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> ally.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all enemies
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color> allies

5.description:
Clear all Barrier from all targets.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>310%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the enemy with the highest Damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
 > Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color> allies.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus per <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> ally.
5.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self, all <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color>, and all <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies.

6.description:
Clear all Barrier from all targets.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>310%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self, all <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color>, and all <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the enemy with the highest Damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
 > Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color> allies.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus per <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> ally.
6.nextUpgrade:
Barrier self, all <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color>, and all <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health
+<color=#86e619>90%</color> damage to all enemies

7.description:
Clear all Barrier from all targets.
Barrier self, all <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color>, and all <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self, all <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color>, and all <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the enemy with the highest Damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
 > Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color> allies.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus per <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> ally.

1.description:
On Turn, heal self and all <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character's Health is above <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Dodge Chance.
When this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or lower, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Dodge Chance when Health is above <color=#86e619>50%</color>
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Drain when this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or lower

2.description:
On Turn, heal self and all <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character's Health is above <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Dodge Chance.
When this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or lower, gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Drain.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Dodge Chance when Health is above <color=#86e619>50%</color>
+<color=#86e619>15%</color> Drain when this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or lower

3.description:
On Turn, heal self and all <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character's Health is above <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Dodge Chance.
When this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or lower, gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Drain.
3.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>150%</color> Focus
<color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color> and <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>150%</color> Focus

4.description:
On Turn, heal self and all <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character's Health is above <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Dodge Chance.
When this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or lower, gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Drain.

Gain +<color=#86e619>150%</color> Focus.
<color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color> and <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>150%</color> Focus.
4.nextUpgrade: When this character or a <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to that character

5.description:
When this character or a <color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to that character.
On Turn, heal self and all <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character's Health is above <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Dodge Chance.
When this character's Health is <color=#86e619>50%</color> or lower, gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Drain.

Gain +<color=#86e619>150%</color> Focus.
<color=#fff568>HIVE-MIND</color> and <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>150%</color> Focus.
